text: Hey Suarab... I think hmari friendship ki beginning common department se hu...Can't belive itni strong ho gyagi hmari dosti. I could definitely say you are my the  CLOSEST friend I have ever had in my life, and  future me sayad hi koi aisa bnda mile jispr mai inna trust kr skta hu...It would be difficult to encapsulate our journey in these few words...Mere college jitne be memories bne... would be incomplete without you....We might have our share of disagreement on some issues(pets)....But abb wo bhi mere funny memories bn gye hai....I really miss wo F2 terrance pr open sky ki niche ki discussions. Your positive attitude towards anything is what I admire in you the most...Thank you for motivating me, understanding me when no one could...Thank you for everything....Apni innocence aise hi bna kr rakhan...Hopefully, we will remain in touch for the rest of our life...P.S. No matter what...something still remains unfulfilled in life and the best way is to move on XD
author: Rahul  Chandra
